name: Evil shepherd
description:
3 hour game jam on the the theme Evil is more fun.

No animals were harmed in the making of this game.

Went slightly over the 3 hours on this one.

You play as an odd yet normal shepherd, or an evil shepherd, or an unnecessarily evil shepherd.  

A and D to move, left shift to sprint. Other instructions on screen.
